CustomField.description: BODEV-2180 Update the table format in Order Form
CustomField.formula: IF( OR( For_Renewal__c = FALSE, ISPICKVAL(PricebookEntry.Product2.Product_Type__c, "Users & Storage"), PricebookEntry.Product2.Product_ID_18_digits__c = '01t0P000002FJq7QAG', PricebookEntry.Product2.Product_ID_18_digits__c = '01t3g000000S23XAAS', PricebookEntry.Product2.Product_ID_18_digits__c = '01t3g000000kQx4AAE', PricebookEntry.Product2.Product_ID_18_digits__c = '01t3g000000SKDQAA4', PricebookEntry.Product2.Product_ID_18_digits__c = '01t3g000000SKDVAA4', PricebookEntry.Product2.Product_ID_18_digits__c = '01tRo000005REVRIA4' /* CI-Hub Figma Users */ ), Quantity,0)
CustomField.label: SpotDraft Transactional Quantity
